original_title: 「東欧の白肌美人の桃色マ○コに精子をドバドバ流し込んでやったんだ！！」日本人の中年オヤジの凄テクに身も心も奪われた白人妻
overview: Sara immigrated from Ukraine to Japan after getting married to the husband. She has this idea of doing pole dancing classes at home, but the neighbor downstairs is pissed off about the noises and he threatens Sara with calling the police on her or getting his dick sucked…
title: 'All I've Ever Wanted Is to See My Seed Gushing Out of the Pretty Pink Pussy of A Pale Eastern European Girl!' Middle-Aged Japanese Man Makes His Dreams Come True with Thoroughly Seduced White Married Woman Sara
